wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Mitchell (1879—after 1899) was a Scottish footballer. An outside left, he first played for Albion Rovers before transferring to Woolwich Arsenal in 1898. He made his debut against Luton Town on 3 September 1898 and scored the winning goal in a 1-0 win. He played ten league games in 1898–99, but soon fell out of favour and left the club at the end of that season.
